018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.types;
019
020import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Order;
021import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
022
023/**
024 * An {@code DataType} that encodes fixed-length values encoded using
025 * {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes#toBytes(String)}. Intended to make it easier to
026 * transition away from direct use of {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes}.
027 * @see org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes#toBytes(String)
028 * @see org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes#toString(byte[], int, int)
029 * @see RawString
030 */
031@InterfaceAudience.Public
032public class RawStringFixedLength extends FixedLengthWrapper<String> {
033
034  /**
035   * Create a {@code RawStringFixedLength} using the specified {@code order} and {@code length}.
036   */
037  public RawStringFixedLength(Order order, int length) {
038    super(new RawString(order), length);
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Create a {@code RawStringFixedLength} of the specified {@code length}.
043   */
044  public RawStringFixedLength(int length) {
045    super(new RawString(), length);
046  }
047}
